sentences: Brandon George Dickinson (born July 18, 1994), better known by his stage name Lil Bibby, is an American rapper and record executive from the Southside of Chicago.
section: N/A

sentences: Beginning his career in 2011, Bibby released his debut mixtape in 2013, titled Free Crack.
section: N/A

sentences: After signing with Kemosabe Records, he followed up the project with Free Crack 2 (2014) and Free Crack 3 (2015).
section: N/A

sentences: In 2017, he eventually switched focus onto his own record label, Grade A Productions.
section: N/A

sentences: Bibby would eventually sign fellow Chicago rapper Juice WRLD and Australian singer/rapper The Kid Laroi to the label, with both signees achieving worldwide success respectively.
